description: Returns the details of a channel based on the membership of the specified AppInstanceUser or AppInstanceBot.

parameters.name: ChannelArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the channel to which the user belongs.

parameters.name: AppInstanceUserArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the user or bot in a channel.

parameters.name: ChimeBearer
parameters.description: The ARN of the AppInstanceUser or AppInstanceBot that makes the API call.

nested_items.name: ChannelMembership
nested_items.description: The channel to which a user belongs.

nested_items.name: ChannelSummary
nested_items.description: Returns the channel data for an AppInstance.

nested_items.name: Privacy
nested_items.description: The privacy setting of the channel.

nested_items.name: LastMessageTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the last persistent message visible to the caller in a channel was sent.

nested_items.name: AppInstanceUserMembershipSummary
nested_items.description: Returns the channel membership data for an AppInstance.

nested_items.name: ReadMarkerTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which an AppInstanceUser last marked a channel as read.

nested_items.name: SubChannelId
nested_items.description: The ID of the SubChannel that the AppInstanceUser is a member of.
